DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : Plasma level catechols distinct meaning term indicate function endogenous catecholamine system . This Protocol design enable ongoing quality assurance diagnostic research assay catechols metabolite identify possible influence dietary constituent condition sample . Study Populations : The study population healthy volunteer . Design : Arm venous blood drawn via indwell i.v . catheter healthy volunteer , obtain quality control plasma . DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : The subject healthy volunteer 18 year old pregnant lactating . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : < TAB > Minors young 18 year old exclude . Examples disqualify condition hepatic failure , history tachyarrhythmias heart block , symptomatic congestive heart failure , severe anemia , psychosis , refractory ventricular arrhythmia , symptomatic coronary heart disease , diabetes mellitus , hyperthyroidism .
